alert.note: Alert for Eastern Albany; Eastern Rensselaer; Western Rensselaer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 5:43PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Columbia, southeastern Albany and Rensselaer Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 543 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Castleton-On-Hudson, or near Nassau, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Albany, Troy, East Greenbush, Rensselaer, Nassau, Menands, New Baltimore, Ravena, Grafton, Berlin, Valatie, Castleton-On-Hudson, Kinderhook, West Sand Lake, Averill Park, Selkirk, Center Brunswick, Wyantskill, Wynantskill and North Greenbush. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between exits 10 and 6. Interstate 87 between exits 21A and 23. Interstate 787 between exits 1 and 7. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for east central New York...and southern Vermont.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Albany; Eastern Rensselaer; Western Rensselaer
